attributes.action: Help British Citizens stranded in India due to Covid -19 to return to the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
In these uncertain times these citizens are anxious and do not know when they will return home to their families.
Some have had two flights cancelled, others are elderly or have health issues who will require repeat medication.
Many will have work or business commitments.
Other countries are organising repatriation flights for their citizens and we ask the British government to do the same.
attributes.background: To work in collaboration with the Indian government and take urgent action to ensure the safe return of British citizens stranded in India as soon as possible.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
